WRITING.TEXT: Hi! I really love your costume and how much attention you give to proper underlayers that are acurrate to the era! It's incredibly overlooked. Hope the rest of the project goes well! Keep up with the good work!

WRITING.TITLE: How do i get rid of gnats?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi! I need some help. There are little flies around my houseplants and in their soil, i know that they're called fungus gnats and that moist soli attracts them but i don't know how to get rid of them. They're a great annoyance and because of it my housemates won't allow me to bring my plants (in containers) back to their original place and instead they sit on the balcony. Here where i live it's slowly getting colder so i better think of something before it's too late. If you know how to help it'd be greatly appreciated!! Thanks!
Hi! Thanks for the recommend! Unfortunately here where i live we don't have walmart but i'm sure i'll find something similar in one of the stores we have.
Hey, thanks for the reply! I'll try your method!!
You explained quite a lot of unasked subquestions I had, thank you!
It's peperomia, but i don't know which species exactly (hope it found a nice home with you!)
I'm coming, should i bring snacks?
I'm so proud of you, my dude!!!! #10084; #65039; Hope ur having a nice day!

WRITING.TITLE: A little help?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi! I wanted to make a mid-lenght sorta cape, but i can't find any free online patterns that don't look like a cheap online bought halloween costume. I would really like this project-in-mind to be wearable and nice! I would love to see your recommends! Thank you! (Also I apologise if my english is not perfect, I'm still learning it)
Hello, thanks to everyone for helping me! I'll definently check out the cape sub! Stay safe ppl! #10084; #65039;

WRITING.TITLE: I got this rose as a birthday present. Up until august it was doing well. Then the leaves started to get yellow and fall off. I cut them down and shortened the stems and it seemed to get back in the game. After some time the leaves bacame droopy and lost it's weigh. Now it lost it's color. Any hope?

WRITING.TEXT: Hi, me again. My aunt takes care of roses and she told me to put a tablespoon of sugar in the water i use for the rose. I did as she said but nothing has changed. This was my first plant and i really want it to survive. Any awnsers would be appreciated! Thank you!
Thanks for the kind words, maybe it's for the best. I can learn from my mistakes and try and better myself in this whole gardening situation. For now, i'll see what I can do.
Amazing job!!! Good to see a fellow hamilton fan!
So glad you (and your plants) found the right person!!

Hi! I have a fittonia, maybe your friend would like that? I don't thik they are that hard to take care of. Do you happen to know if your friend has enough light for the plants you were thinking of giving her? I'm sure she'll like any plant you give her!

WRITING.TITLE: Bottom watering?
WRITING.TEXT: Hi, so i want to try to bottom water my plants (pothos, polka dot plant, fittonia, kalachoe) mainly because it would help with the fungus gnats (from what i know, they lay little babies if the top of the soil is wet). Can anyone explain how exactly am i to water them that way? Any awnser would be appreciated! Thanks
Thanks for the reply, my dude!
